parameters: If you want to view the tutorial again there will be a few books prefixed with
the "Tut-" and then the name of the tutorial. \n<Tutorial:>
Moving is simple, you can either click where you want to go, or you can use the
Interacting with this is simple, you can either click on it, or press the OK key
To progress through a talk window click or press the OK button. \w[10]
I guess you already know that by now...\n<Interact:>
Lets go over some of the \C[1]Menus\C[0]. \n<Menus:>
Opening the menu is as simple as right clicking or by pressing the CANCEL
Navigating the menus is the same as moving, either click or use the arrow key.
Once you have highlighted the menu you want to open either click on it or press
Theres a lot to go over.\w[10].\w[10].\w[20] too much to go over at one time.
So we'll go over them as we move on.
You have received a quest, Why don't we take a look at how to get to it.
Once you have opened the main menu you can find it resting just above \C[1]Options\C[0]. \n<Quests:>
Inside the Quests menu you will be presented by the overview of the quest menu.
On the left you can see a small window with a four sub-menus. Lets take a look.
The first sub-menu is called \C[1]Available\C[0]. Here you can see the quests
that you are currnently in the middle of.
The \C[1]Completed\C[0] sub-menu will list all the quests that you have
Now for the scariest sub-menu, the \C[1]Failed\C[0] sub-menu. Here you can find
all the quests that you didn't quite finish.
And finally \C[1]All Quests\C[0]. This will list all the that have been given to
Clicking on a quest will open up the information window about that quest.
Each Quest will have a few things like:
\C[2][ Name ~ Level ~ From ~ Location ~ Description ~ Objectives ~ Rewards]\C[0]
Lets go over each one shall we.
The \C[1]Name\C[0] of the quest can be found in three places. It's kinda
The \C[1]Level\C[0] is the recomended level you should be for this quest.
The \C[1]From\C[0] is who you got the quest from.
The \C[1]Location\C[0] is where you need to go when you are ready to turn in the
The \C[1]Description\C[0] is a basic overview of the quest.
The \C[1]Objectives\C[0] is what you need to do in order to complete the quest.
Once an objective has been completed the silver ball will turn blue.
The \C[1]Rewards\C[0] you can't se them in this picture but they are there, and
this what you get for completing the quest.
Okay that should about cover all the information here.

leave a comment or two about it.
